definition: Hmong or Miao ethnic group of southwest China/surname Miao
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: The optimal sowing period and the growth of summer maize are often affected by the high temperature and less rainfall in the early Summer.
sentences.chinese: 初夏高温少雨，常影响夏玉米适时播种和苗期生长。

sentences.english: Athetis lepigone is a new insect pest in seedling stage of summer corn in China, and causes serious damage.
sentences.chinese: 二点委夜蛾是我国夏玉米苗期的新害虫，危害性极强。

sentences.english: The earlier the sowing date was, the smaller effect on seeding stage the coating strength had.
sentences.chinese: 播期越早，包衣强度对玉米种子出苗期的影响越小。

sentences.english: The result of genetic analysis in endosperms is simi-liar to that in seedling stage.
sentences.chinese: 苗期和灌浆期遗传分析结果是一致的。

sentences.english: To discuss the stocky efficiency of plant growth retardants, characteristics of areca(Areca catechu L.
sentences.chinese: 为探讨生长延缓剂对槟榔苗期矮壮的光合特性。

sentences.english: Field trials were conducted to determine control effect on cotton seedling diseases at different dosage of 2.
sentences.chinese: 适乐时悬浮种衣剂对棉花苗期病害的相对防效。

sentences.english: In the whole growing period of groundnut, an obvious peak of NRA came out in seedling stage.
sentences.chinese: 在整个生育期内NRA在苗期出现一次明显的高峰。

sentences.english: Cold tolerance at the seedling stage are one of important factors affecting the development of growth in rice.
sentences.chinese: 苗期耐冷性是影响水稻生长发育的重要因素之一。

definition: tiller (stem at the base of grass plants)
to sprout/to come out (of seedling)/to bud
the embryonic development of grain while still on the stem
